content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 slices whole wheat bread, toasted (optional)" )
( ing-7 "1/4 avocado - peeled, pitted and sliced" )
( ing-8 "3 ounces Colby-Monterey Jack cheese, sliced" )

content.text: 0) Spread mayonnaise on one slice of toast, then spread mustard on the other.
1) Arrange the sliced turkey on one side.
3) Pile on the salad greens, bean sprouts, avocado and cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Pile"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the salad greens"@11:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "bean sprouts"@29:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "avocado"@43:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cheese"@55:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Finish with tomato slices, then place the remaining slice of toast on top.
